item.title: 台积电股价错位达到 16 年来最严重水平
item.description: 台湾积体电路制造股份有限公司的美国存托凭证与其在台北上市的股票之间的价格差距飙升至 16 年多来最大的水平，再次引发了人们对围绕人工智能的兴奋情绪可能过热的担忧。【原文：The price gap between Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.’s American depositary receipts and its Taipei-listed shares surged to the widest level in more than 16 years, reigniting concerns that the euphoria surrounding artificial intelligence may be overheating.】

item.title: 美国关税协议达成前韩国出口势头不减
item.description: 韩国的出口在 7 月份再次攀升，这很可能是受到了企业在美国提高关税前抢占先机的支撑。【原文：South Korea’s exports climbed again in July, likely supported by front-loading as companies sought to get ahead of an increase in US tariffs.】

item.title: 机器人成为中国科技股上涨的新驱动力，涨幅达 75
item.description: 今年早些时候，DeepSeek 公司在人工智能领域的进步引发了市场反弹，投资者正在为这一反弹寻找新的催化剂。【原文：Chinese robotics stocks are drawing fresh market attention as investors look for new catalysts for the rally sparked earlier this year by DeepSeek’s advances in artificial intelligence.】

item.title: Mac 销量和 iPhone 升级推动苹果在华卷土重来
item.description: 苹果公司公布了其两年来在中国的首次销售增长，称新 Mac 电脑和城市居民手机用户的需求助推了销售反弹。【原文：Apple Inc. posted its first sales growth in China in two years, saying that new Mac computers and demand from city-dwelling phone customers helped fuel the rebound.】

item.title: 特朗普在最后期限前对马来西亚出口产品征收 19% 的关税
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统将对马来西亚出口到美国的产品征收 19% 的关税，低于他在 7 月份威胁要征收的 25% 的税率。【原文：President Donald Trump will impose a 19% tariff on exports from Malaysia to the US, a lower rate than the 25% levy he threatened in July.】

item.title: 市场密切关注特朗普的关税举措，黄金保持涨势
item.description: 白宫公布了美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）对贸易伙伴征收的关税税率，该税率将于周五生效。【原文：Gold held an advance — but remained on track for a weekly loss — as the White House unveiled President Donald Trump’s tariff rates on trading partners that are set to take effect on Friday.】

item.title: 特朗普将对从瑞士进口的商品征收 39% 的关税
item.description: 根据唐纳德-特朗普总统周四晚间签署的一项行政命令，他将对从瑞士进口的商品征收 39% 的关税。【原文：President Donald Trump will impose a 39% levy on imports from Switzerland, according to an executive order he signed Thursday night.】

item.title: 达成和平协议后，特朗普对泰国和柬埔寨征收 19% 的关税
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普本月早些时候威胁说，除非泰国和柬埔寨结束一场致命的边境冲突，否则将阻止与两国达成贸易协议，此后，美国对从泰国和柬埔寨进口的商品征收 19% 的关税，低于两国最初面临的 36% 的关税。【原文：The US set a 19% levy on imports from Thailand and Cambodia, lower than the 36% they originally faced, after President Donald Trump earlier this month threatened to block trade deals with them unless they ended a deadly border clash.】

item.title: 交易商关注俄罗斯和美国关税，石油有望实现周线上涨
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普加大对俄罗斯的压力之后，石油有望创下自6月中旬以来的最大单周涨幅，同时市场也在为周五生效的美国关税所带来的影响做准备。【原文：Oil is on track for the biggest weekly gain since mid-June after President Donald Trump ramped up pressure on Russia, as the market braced for the fallout from US tariffs that take effect on Friday.】

item.title: Figma IPO 为风险投资公司 Index 和 Greylock 各带来 70 亿美元回报
item.description:
这家设计公司的首次公开募股为其早期风险投资支持者带来了数十亿美元的收益。【原文：

The design firm’s blockbuster IPO is bringing billions to its early venture backers.

】

item.title: 特朗普将关税基准税率定为 10%，并对加拿大加征关税
item.description: 洛杉矶港的集装箱船。摄影师：Tim Rue/Bloomberg【原文：Container ships at the Port of Los Angeles. Photographer: Tim Rue/Bloomberg】

item.title: 特朗普将对加拿大的关税提高至 35%，但保留 USMCA 豁免权
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统表示，在两国贸易谈判破裂后，美国将对从加拿大进口的部分商品征收 35% 的关税。【原文：President Donald Trump said the US will put a 35% tariff on some imports from Canada after trade negotiations between the two countries broke down.】

item.title: 特朗普在最后期限前设定关税，基准税率为 10
item.description: 白宫周四发表声明称，唐纳德-特朗普总统将把全球最低关税税率维持在 10%，抵制此前提出的可能将下限提高到 15%或更高的建议。【原文：President Donald Trump will keep minimum global tariff rates at 10%, resisting prior suggestions he could raise the floor to 15% or higher, according to a White House statement Thursday.】

item.title: 与封锁期间相比，英国首席执行官对经济更加悲观
item.description: 一项新的调查显示，英国高管对英国经济前景的信心不如大流行病期间国家停摆时，这表明政府已经失去了商界的支持。【原文：British executives are less confident in the UK’s economic prospects than when the country shut down during the pandemic, a new survey showed, suggesting that the government has lost the support of the business community.】

item.title: 比索下滑，国际货币基金组织批准向阿根廷拨款 20 亿美元
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）执行董事会周四批准向阿根廷拨款 20 亿美元，这是在哈维尔-米莱（Javier Milei）政府未能实现一项关键目标、比索创下一年多来最糟糕月度汇率的情况下投下的关键信任票。【原文：The International Monetary Fund’s executive board approved a $2 billion disbursement to Argentina Thursday, a key vote of confidence even as the government of Javier Milei missed a key target while the peso posted its worst month in more than a year.】

item.title: Figma 首次公开募股 250% 使其在人工智能创意软件竞争中占得先机
item.description: Figma Inc. 首次上市就大涨 250%，这正是每家初创公司上市时梦寐以求的 "出道派对"。【原文：Figma Inc.’s 250% surge in its debut session is the kind of coming-out party every startup dreams of when it goes public.】

item.title: First Solar 称特朗普的税收和支出法使其更加强大
item.description: 与乔-拜登（Joe Biden）提出具有里程碑意义的 2022 年气候法相比，唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统的税收与支出法通过后，First Solar 公司的实力更胜一筹：首席执行官马克-维德玛（Mark Widmar）在公司财报电话会议上表示。【原文：First Solar is in a greater position of strength after the passage of President Donald Trump’s tax-and-spending law than it was following Joe Biden’s landmark 2022 climate law: CEO Mark Widmar on co.’s earnings call.】

item.title: 特朗普缩减关税后，铜 "乐透彩票 "获得回报
item.description: 押注特朗普政府将食言对进口原铜征收关税的期权交易商正在大赚一笔。【原文：Options traders who bet the Trump administration would renege on its promise to tariff raw copper imports are cashing in big.】

item.title: 市场综述：关税限期令市场情绪低落，亚洲股市将下滑
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普总统提出的关税最后期限到来之前，投资者情绪低落，削弱了美国股市和亚洲股票期货。【原文：Investor sentiment soured ahead of President Donald Trump’s tariff deadline, weakening US stocks and Asian equity futures.】

item.title: 尽管价格下降、销售疲软，淡水河谷本季度业绩依然稳健
item.description: 淡水河谷公司（Vale SA）是世界上最大的铁矿石供应商之一，该公司第二季度的业绩好于预期，没有受到销售疲软和铁矿石价格走软的影响，因为产量激增有助于提高盈利。【原文：Vale SA, one of the world’s top iron ore suppliers, delivered stronger than expected second-quarter results, defying weaker sales and softer iron ore prices as a surge in output helped bolster earnings.】

item.title: 雪佛龙将根据新的生产条款向委内瑞拉交付石油
item.description: 据知情人士透露，雪佛龙公司（Chevron Corp.）在获得在南美国家重启运营的许可后，将根据谈判达成的新条款向当地政府移交一定比例的委内瑞拉产量。【原文：Chevron Corp. will hand over a percentage of its Venezuelan production to the local government under new terms negotiated after receiving a license to restart operations in the South American nation, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 特朗普称加拿大需为贸易停战付出代价
item.description: 在美国与加拿大总理马克-卡尼（Mark Carney）的会谈进入最后阶段之际，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示，加拿大必须 "支付合理的税率 "才能达成贸易协议。【原文：US President Donald Trump said Canada has to “pay a fair rate” in order to reach a trade agreement, as US talks with Canadian Prime Minister Mark Carney go down to the wire.】

item.title: 贸易商严阵以待关税冲击后的伦敦金属交易所铜市浪潮
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）做出了不对主要交易金属征收关税的惊人决定，这将促使大量铜流入伦敦金属交易所的仓库。【原文：Copper traders are rushing to book up storage space in a bet that US President Donald Trump’s shock decision not to tariff the main traded form of the metal will prompt a wave of copper into warehouses on the London Metal Exchange.】

item.title: Figma 大手笔 IPO 为首席执行官菲尔德带来 60 亿美元财富
item.description: 根据彭博亿万富豪指数（Bloomberg Billionaires Index），Figma 公司首次公开募股的井喷使联合创始人迪伦-菲尔德（Dylan Field）的身家达到 61 亿美元，即将跻身世界 500 富豪之列。【原文：The blowout initial public offering of Figma Inc. gives co-founder Dylan Field a fortune of $6.1 billion, putting him on the verge of being ranked among the world’s 500 richest people, according to the Bloomberg Billionaires Index.】

item.title: 贸易困境和高估值使澳大利亚盈利成为焦点
item.description: 全球贸易前景暗淡，估值上升，加剧了澳大利亚在本报告季的盈利压力。【原文：A murky global trade outlook and elevated valuations are intensifying earnings pressure in Australia this reporting season.】

item.title: 特朗普是如何让价值 1 万亿美元的进口商品逃脱关税重锤的？
item.description:
排除条款反映了相互冲突的目标：既要破坏全球贸易规则，又要保护美国消费者。但这一过程并不透明，而且并非每个人都能获胜。【原文：

Exclusions reflect conflicting goals: to rip up the rules of global trade while cushioning US consumers. But the process isn’t transparent, and not everybody wins. 

】

item.title: 加密货币--国债融资在脆弱的市场中不断增加
item.description: Sidhartha Shukla 写道："问任何交易商，他们都会告诉你：趁着好时光筹集资金。【原文：Ask any dealmaker and they’ll tell you: raise money while the good times last, writes Sidhartha Shukla.】

item.title: 交易量下降导致收入不及预期，Coinbase 下跌
item.description: 美国最大的加密货币交易所 Coinbase Global Inc. 公布的第二季度收入低于预期，原因是数字资产市场波动性下降。【原文：Shares of Coinbase Global Inc. fell after the largest US crypto exchange reported lower-than-estimated second-quarter revenue amid a drop in digital-asset market volatility.】

item.title: 凭借 iPhone 和中国市场的强劲表现，苹果公司营收超出预期
item.description: 苹果公司（Apple Inc.【原文：Apple Inc. reported third-quarter revenue that handily topped analysts’ estimates, boosted by strong sales of the iPhone and products in China.】

item.title: Saylor's Strategy 在本季度获得巨额未实现收益
item.description: 迈克尔-赛勒的 "战略 "公司重申，该公司在第二季度获得了约 140 亿美元的未实现收益，并强调在此期间筹集了超过 100 亿美元的资金。【原文：Michael Saylor’s Strategy reiterated that it registered an unrealized gain of about $14 billion in the second quarter, and highlighted the raising of over $10 billion during the period.】
